text:
I've encountered the mythical belief that now "everybody" has internet access all the time everywhere in other contexts. It is entirely mythical, but is that what's behind this language? This has been Microsoft’s stance since at least Windows 7 if not before. -- There are 10 kinds of people in the world...
 those who understand binary and those who don't. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ %40ATLEXCH03.byers.local
